wiki.content:
A song about writing a song.  Before recording it, Cobain had quickly scribbled a new lyric detailing his writer's block.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: A song about writing a song.  Before recording it, Cobain had quickly scribbled a new lyric detailing his writer's block.

track.name: On a Plain
comments: Includes in their top-3 songs along Drain You & Smells Like Teen Spirit.
What the hell am i trying to say?
this song is rigged because you. seriously. cant. complain. dammit kurt
Kurt has the perfect voice for any rock band. What a great lyricist. rip Kurt [2]
Best song on Nevermind.
Love you Kurt.
Kurt has the perfect voice for any rock band. What a great lyricist. rip Kurt
I'M ON A PLANE I CAN'T COMPLANE
I fucking love this song.
my mother died every night as well. and so did everyone else.
@SteveMono haha my sister's like that. I like them though....the band that I have to admit not really liking is LedZep :o
Its confession time.... I never really got into Nirvana...sorry but its true! Anyone else brave enough to admit they never really liked them that much?
Its confession time.... I never really got into Nirvana...sorry but its true! Anyone else brave enough to admit they never really liked them that much?

"Never thought it worked all that well unplugged personally" agreed wholeheartedly.  the original is really really good but the unplugged version is a bit boring. which is weird, most of the versions on that album are brilliant (Something in the Way is perfect). i think the song just works best as a big messy drop D slur.
awesome [4]
Best on album by far. *_*
Never thought it worked all that well unplugged personally
MTV version is Amazing!
but i love this fucking song
great but i nedn´t a chilsong sorry
